content.rendered:
Market Holidays in August 2023

The schedule may be subject to change.

Windsor Brokers reserves the right to act in accordance with the market conditions therefore may change Margin Requirements, enable “Close Only”, or even disable trading on financial instrument(s) which may be affected, without prior notice, if deemed necessary.

It is advisable to take extra precautions when trading during market holiday(s) and/or periods of market volatility due to extraordinary events, and/or during periods of reduced/increased levels of liquidity, which are likely to result in wider spreads and/or price gaps.
